name: AutoCAD Slide Library
summary: Learn about .SLB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create a SLB file, specify a corresponding text file (e.g., "slidelist.txt") with the names of the SLD files that you want to include in the slide library. Then run the following command: slidelib library < slidelist.txt.

description: Slide library created by the "slidelib" utility, which is included with the AutoCAD software installation; contains a collection of slides (.SLD) files; used to display slideshows of CAD designs.
